note: Validation error when no phone number is provided
English Text: Please enter your phone number.

note: API response when provided phone number is invalid
English Text: Invalid phone number. Please check and try again.

note: Fallback error when SMS verification fails
English Text: An error occurred during verification.

note: Fallback error when saving the secure key fails
English Text: An error occurred while setting the key.

note: Heading asking how the user wants to receive results
English Text: How would you like us to identify you for test results and follow-up?

note: Consent option label for sharing phone number
English Text: You can send me a link for my results to my mobile phone number:

note: Label above the phone number input
English Text: Phone Number

note: Placeholder example for the phone number input
Button text to trigger SMS verification
English Text: Verify

note: Button label showing countdown seconds (keep short)
English Text: {seconds}s

note: Label referencing the destination of the verification code
English Text: Enter the Verification Code sent to {phone}

note: Placeholder instructing user to enter SMS code
English Text: Enter the verification code sent to your phone

note: Instruction shown when the SMS code was not received
English Text: If you did not receive the code, please check your phone number and try again.

note: Message showing how long until a new code request is allowed
English Text: You can request a new code in {seconds} seconds.

note: First part of the anonymous option label before the case ID
English Text: No, i will note my Questionnaire-ID and remain completely anonymous:

note: Second sentence of the anonymous option label after the case ID
English Text: I will check www.stay-sure.ch/results in the following days.

note: Paragraph explaining why the secure key is required
English Text: To protect your results, please set a secure key below. You will need this key to access your test results and for any follow-up consultations. You can use the password manager of your browser or smartphone to generate and store a secure key.

note: Label displayed above the secure key input
English Text: Your secure key

note: Button text for finalizing the phone number step
English Text: Finalize

note: Title displayed when showing the final recap
English Text: Summary

note: Alert shown when submitting the form fails
English Text: Error submitting form. Please try again.

note: Label prefix inside the error message banner
English Text: Error:

note: Heading on the completion page
English Text: Thank You

note: Body paragraph shown on completion page
English Text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Cupiditate fugiat facere ipsum modi ipsam repudiandae, quam quia officia est! Dignissimos eaque quaerat excepturi optio harum porro veritatis autem id corrupti.

note: Instruction reminding the user to note their ID
English Text: Bitte notieren sie sich ihre ID-Nummer:

note: Menu title displayed before section list
English Text: Sections

note: Fallback text when a question has no stored answer
English Text: No answer

note: Placeholder label for free text inputs attached to options
English Text: Additional text for {option}

note: Placeholder text for select dropdown inputs
English Text: Select an option
